channel.title: Tatl//317
channel.description:
Contents
[ul][li][iurl=#developers]Developers[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#progress]Skill Progress[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#media]Media[/iurl][/li][/ul]
[quote="WW"]I appreciate the amount of support in such a small time & I've updated the thread with some more information so you could follow the development a little bit more closely. I forgot to mention that this is not a remake so don't expect 100% perfect replica skills that take a year to create *cough*[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489018.0.html]RS2006[/url]*cough*.[/quote]The server is based off of winterlove crash patched by [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=23929]blakeman8192 [/url]with java.nio implemented by my msn mate [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=522217]Advocatus[/url]. I've listed [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=522217]Advocatus[/url] as a developer simply for the networking. He is part of his own project [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,522952.msg3804092.html#msg3804092]seen here[/url]. I will attempt to make everything driven by [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=22632]Graham[/url]'s cycle task manager.
[anchor=developers]Developers: [ul][li]James (WW) - Working on content & framework.[/li][li]David (Advocatus) - java.nio[/li][/ul] [anchor=progress]Skills Progress: [sup][s][b]crossed[/b][/s] means complete.[/sup] [sup]* - custom made[/sup] [ul][li]Agility[list][li]Gnome agility course[/li][li]Barbarian agility course[/li][li]Wilderness agility course[/li][/list][/li] [li][s]Cooking[/s][list][li][s]Most fish and meat can be cooked[/s][/li][li][s]Burning food depending on level[/s][/li][li][s]Cooking interface[/s][/li][/list][/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Farming[/li] [li]Firemaking[list][li]Ashes appear after burning a log[/li][li]Clipped forced walking[/li][/list][/li] [li]Fishing[list][li]Most fish can be caught[/li][li]Correct level and equipment requirements[/li][/list][/li] [li]Fletching[list][li]All logs can be fletched[/li][li]Arrow & dart fletching[/li][li]Stringing unfinished bows[/li][/list][/li] [li]Herblore[list][li]Identifying herbs[/li][li]Unfinished Potion/Complete Potion making[/li][/list][/li] [li]Mining[list][li]Ore replaced with 'empty ore' object once mined[/li][li]Prospecting different type of ores[/li][/list][/li] [li]Prayer[list][li]Bone burying[/li][li]* Using bones on an alter[/li][/list][/li] [li]Runecrafting[list][li]Multiple runes with higher levels[/li][li]Wearing runecrafting tiaras[/li][li]Runecrafting pouches[/li][li]Abyss with portals .etc.[/li][/list][/li] [li]Slayer[list][li]Working slayer equipment with effects on slayer monsters[/li][li]Several slayer masters (easy, medium & hard)[/li][li]Slayer gem actually contacts your slayer master[/li][/list][/li] [li]Smithing[list][li]Smelting bars using furnace[/li][li]All equipment available from bars[/li][/list][/li] [li]Thieving[list][li]Pickpocketing NPCs[/li][li]Stealing from stalls[/li][/list][/li] [li]Woodcutting[list][li]Most trees available[/li][li]Stump after tree is cut down[/li][/list][/li][/ul] Currently working on: [ul][li]Cooking[/li][/ul] [anchor=media]Media: [sup]Newest down to oldest[/sup] [img]http://i.imgur.com/shOom.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MJCMJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Bnj8W.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sqwRa.png[/img]

item.description:
@WW1 wrote:

It’s been a very long fortnight work wise but I’ve found some time to finish most of cooking off. Uploading images and going to get a start on herblore.

item.title: Tatl//317
item.dc:creator: @WW1 WW
item.description:
@WW1 wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:11, topic:426939”][quote author=WW link=topic=529637.msg3866305#msg3866305 date=1325027954]
I appreciate the amount of support in such a small time & I’ve updated the thread with some more information so you could follow the development a little bit more closely. I forgot to mention that this is not a remake so don’t expect 100% perfect replica skills that take a year to create coughRS2006cough.
[/quote]

RS2006’s whole server could be replicated in a few days if people that knew enough about programming would commit time to rsps.

EDIT:
I’m not saying that RS2006 is decent quality either. The whole server is written upon rubbish, so I wouldn’t expect the final product to be any better then the initial base. So by saying people with enough knowledge in programming, I’m not saying that RS2006’s development team has knowledge in programming that would make the job even hard to replicate. Just the time involved with creating all the content properly (better then RS2006) would take time to find animations, requirements, item, npc, and object ids, ect.

Anyways, good luck with your development. I would suggest removed the Menu bar, or create the possibility of disabling it. If you ever want to turn this into a webclient, that is something you may want to think about. Other then that, I don’t see enough media or information to give any other feed back.[/quote]Couldn’t agree more, but there isn’t much solid proof. I dislike him highly simply for his arrogance and uptight attitude - his project will fail simply because there aren’t dedicated players left that will play a server longer than a week anyway and the fact that he has taken a year to do what most PI users can provide within weeks.

Anyways, I’ve made the change to Ubunutu - lost my client but remade it after some help from mates. Happy new years guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Tatl//317
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

WW:

I appreciate the amount of support in such a small time & I’ve updated the thread with some more information so you could follow the development a little bit more closely. I forgot to mention that this is not a remake so don’t expect 100% perfect replica skills that take a year to create coughRS2006cough.

RS2006’s whole server could be replicated in a few days if people that knew enough about programming would commit time to rsps.

EDIT:
I’m not saying that RS2006 is decent quality either. The whole server is written upon rubbish, so I wouldn’t expect the final product to be any better then the initial base. So by saying people with enough knowledge in programming, I’m not saying that RS2006’s development team has knowledge in programming that would make the job even hard to replicate. Just the time involved with creating all the content properly (better then RS2006) would take time to find animations, requirements, item, npc, and object ids, ect.

Anyways, good luck with your development. I would suggest removed the Menu bar, or create the possibility of disabling it. If you ever want to turn this into a webclient, that is something you may want to think about. Other then that, I don’t see enough media or information to give any other feed back.

Read full topic

[quote=“WW”]I appreciate the amount of support in such a small time & I’ve updated the thread with some more information so you could follow the development a little bit more closely. I forgot to mention that this is not a remake so don’t expect 100% perfect replica skills that take a year to create coughRS2006cough.[/quote]The server is based off of winterlove crash patched by blakeman8192 with java.nio implemented by my msn mate Advocatus. I’ve listed Advocatus as a developer simply for the networking. He is part of his own project seen here. I will attempt to make everything driven by Graham’s cycle task manager.
